summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to business licensing; adding exemptions for rental income and utility revenue taxed under SMC Chapter 5.48; providing for a two-tier business license fee structure; providing a grace period before assessing penalties to licensees that file annual business license renewals late; increasing the cost of annual and half-year business licenses and abolishing the surcharge on those licenses; adding Section 5.45.076; and amending Sections 5.30.20, 5.30.25, 5.30.030, 5.30.035, 5.30.040, 5.30.050, 5.30.060, 5.45.050, 5.45.070, 5.45.075, 5.45.076, 5.45.090, 5.55.030, 5.55.040, and 6.20.050, respectively, of the Seattle Municipal Code.
